ussr.physics
Interface PhysicsSimulationHelper

All Known Implementing Classes:
JMEGeometryHelper
public interface PhysicsSimulationHelper

A helper class for physics simulations, containing various utility methods that can be applied to the PhysicsSimulation object associated with this helper.

Author:
Modular Robots @ MMMI
